concept.title: Release Notes
concept.shortdesc: The Symbian Developer Library for Product Developers is intended for device developers and contributors to the Symbian platform. The information in the library corresponds to the Symbian^3 platform release.

section.title: What's new in this release
section.p: The following S60 5th Edition C++ Developer's Library 'Technology area guides' have been integrated into the Symbian guide:

li.p: Application and UI frameworks is now in Classic UI Guide.
S60 UI components is now in Classic UI Guide.
Multimedia is now in Multimedia Guide.
Browsing and downloading is now in Web Guide.
Location is now in Location Based Services (LBS).
Security is now found at the top level.

section.p: The S60 Open C and Open C++ documentation has been merged into the Symbian P.I.P.S. documentation and is now in Generic OS Services Guide.
The Symbian Developer Library is now released under the Eclipse Public License (EPL).

section.title: Known issues
section.p: This release does not contain any API specifications. These are available in the Symbian Developer Library for the Symbian^2 platform release.

Some topics previously included in the S60 5th Edition C++ Developer's Library are not yet available, including S60 device user experience, UI porting guide, and What's new. These are planned to be included in an upcoming release.
The library contains some broken links, and some links to legacy websites for instance Symbian Developer Network.
Some sections under Symbian guide do not map correctly to Symbian Foundation packages.

A “Getting Started” section is not included in this release. Until this has been addressed, it is recommended that you refer to the Symbian Foundation's Symbian C++ Quick Start and Going Beyond Hello for this information.

section.title: Upcoming releases and improvements in the Symbian Developer Library for Product Developers
section.p: See the Documentation Content Package Backlog.

section.title: Feedback
section.p: To give feedback, please go to the Symbian Foundation Bugtracker (login required).
